message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I think a starting price of $14,000 feels fair.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the starting point.  I'm looking to spend closer to $12,000 for this product.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't quite go down to $12,000. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
